text:
Champions League
Chelsea - Ajax streaming: where to see the match?
Chelsea receives Ajax Amsterdam for the fourth day of the Champions League. A meeting broadcast live on French television on the RMC Sport 5 channel, this Tuesday, November 5, 2019 from 21 hours, but also to follow live streaming on Android, iPhone, iPad, PC or Mac.
05 Nov 2019, 04:15 by Hugo Deloraine



Chelsea: the possible eleven of the seasonNew season for Chelsea, under the leadership of Franck Lampard! Discover the possible eleven of the Blues for the coming season.Icon Sport



KepaIcon Sport



C√©sar AzpilicuetaIcon Sport



Antonio R√ºdigerIcon Sport



David LuizIcon Sport



Marcos AlonsoIcon Sport



N'Golo Kant√©Icon Sport



JorginhoIcon Sport



Mateo KovacicIcon Sport



WillianIcon Sport



Olivier GiroudIcon Sport



Christian PulisicIcon Sport

Chelsea: the possible eleven of the season




Chelsea receives at Stamford Bridge this Tuesday, November 5th. After two victorious trips, the Blues will face again Ajax Amsterdam, which they struggled to beat in the first leg (0-1). These two teams are leading the group H and the winner would take a serious option for qualifying in the 1/8 elimination round.







The schedule of group H




Batshuayi + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

1st day - September 17th

Ajax Amsterdam 3-0 Lille
Chelsea 0-1 Valencia

2nd day - October 2nd

Lille 1-2 Chelsea
Valencia 0-3 Ajax Amsterdam

3rd day - 23rd of October

Ajax Amsterdam 0-1 Chelsea
Lille 1-1 Valencia

4th day - November 5th

9 pm: Valence - Lille
9 pm: Chelsea - Ajax Amsterdam

5th day - 27th November

18h55: Valencia - Chelsea
9 pm: Lille - Ajax Amsterdam

6th day - December 10th

9 pm: Chelsea - Lille
9 pm: Ajax Amsterdam - Valencia

The classification of group H





+12 üì∑
Credit Photo - Icon Sport



Chelsea - 6 pts (+1)
Ajax - 6 pts (+5)
Valencia - 4 pts
Lille - 1 pt

The first two of the group are qualified in the round of 16. The third is donated to the Europa League. The last definitely leaves the European Cup for this season.
Chelsea-Ajax streaming




Chelsea + 12 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This match of the fourth day of Champions League between Chelsea and Ajax Amsterdam is broadcast this Tuesday, November 5, 2019 on RMC Sport 5 from 21 hours, French time. A channel accessible by subscription to a limited number of audiovisual actors. Mainly SFR and Canal +. As a result, you can not access it via your Internet operator for example, there is an alternative solution: the 100% digital offer of RMC Sport (or OTT). A subscription available at a price of 9 euros per month for mobile or fixed subscribers of SFR, 19 euros per month with commitment / 25 euros per month without commitment for non-subscribers.
Discover below the list of supports to watch RMC Sport streaming:


iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch


Android


PC / Mac via Internet browser type Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge

Chromecast, Apple TV, Samsung Smart TV, Nvidia Shield, Philips with Connect TV option



Photo Albums
